privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
content: YourVoiceHub is committed to protecting your privacy.
We collect personal data to enhance your experience.
We do not sell or share your data without consent.
For more details, contact us at support@yourvoicehub.com.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
content: By using YourVoiceHub, you agree to our terms.
You are responsible for your content.
We reserve the right to suspend accounts for misuse.
